The Office of Student Conduct has a [list of the resources](https://studentconduct.sa.ucsb.edu/resources/campus-resources) available to students at UCSB. Some especially useful ones include:  

- [**Disabled Students Program**](https://dsp.sa.ucsb.edu/): testing accommodations, note-taking help  
- [**Counseling & Psychological Services**](https://caps.sa.ucsb.edu/): mental health care and counseling  
- [**Resource Center for Sexual & Gender Diversity**](https://rcsgd.sa.ucsb.edu/): resources to support members of the LGBTQIA+ community
